metadata.title: USN-5493-2 -- Linux kernel (HWE) vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that the 8 Devices USB2CAN interface implementation in the Linux kernel did not properly handle certain error conditions, leading to a double-free. A local attacker could possibly use this to cause a denial of service (system crash).  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5493-2` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  linux-hwe-5.4-cloud-tools-common - 5.4.0-121.137~18.04.1 linux-hwe-5.4-cloud-tools-5.4.0-121 - 5.4.0-121.137~18.04.1 linux-modules-extra-5.4.0-121-generic -
